JobTitle: North America Regional Strategic Partner Manager
JobFullDesc: Facebook is looking for a strategic and results-driven Strategic Partnerships professional who is passionate about the way Facebook Inc. can work with businesses and developers to build valuable product experiences for people. As a member of this team, you will work closely with some of the world’s most influential companies and collaborate closely with our product teams to build new platform products and features. In addition to these teams, you will be working closely with Product, Engineering, Product Marketing, and Sales teams to further accelerate our platform mission to enable developers and businesses to grow by building innovative products and sustainable ecosystems. This role will report into the Head of North America Strategic Platform Partnerships.
